Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

5 #include "KRandom.h"

8 namespace Kassiopeia

11  KSRootSurfaceInteraction::KSRootSurfaceInteraction() :
12  fSurfaceInteraction( NULL ),
13  fStep( NULL ),
14  fTerminatorParticle( NULL ),
15  fInteractionParticle( NULL ),
16  fParticleQueue( NULL )
17  {
18  }
19  KSRootSurfaceInteraction::KSRootSurfaceInteraction( const KSRootSurfaceInteraction& aCopy ) :
20  KSComponent(),
21  fSurfaceInteraction( aCopy.fSurfaceInteraction ),
22  fStep( aCopy.fStep ),
23  fTerminatorParticle( aCopy.fTerminatorParticle ),
24  fInteractionParticle( aCopy.fInteractionParticle ),
25  fParticleQueue( aCopy.fParticleQueue )
26  {
27  }
28  KSRootSurfaceInteraction* KSRootSurfaceInteraction::Clone() const
29  {
30  return new KSRootSurfaceInteraction( *this );
31  }
32  KSRootSurfaceInteraction::~KSRootSurfaceInteraction()
33  {
34  }
35 
36  void KSRootSurfaceInteraction::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aSecondaries )
37  {
38  if( fSurfaceInteraction == NULL )
39  {
40  intmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> cannot execute interaction with no surface interaction set" << eom;
41  }
42  fSurfaceInteraction->ExecuteInteraction( anInitialParticle, aFinalParticle, aSecondaries );
43  return;
44  }
45 
46  void KSRootSurfaceInteraction::SetSurfaceInteraction( KSSurfaceInteraction* aSurfaceInteraction )
47  {
48  if( fSurfaceInteraction != NULL )
49  {
50  intmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> tried to set surface interaction <" << aSurfaceInteraction->GetName() << "> with surface interaction <" << fSurfaceInteraction->GetName() << "> already set" << eom;
51  return;
52  }
53  intmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> setting surface interaction <" << aSurfaceInteraction->GetName() << ">" << eom );
54  fSurfaceInteraction = aSurfaceInteraction;
55  return;
56  }
57  void KSRootSurfaceInteraction::ClearSurfaceInteraction( KSSurfaceInteraction* aSurfaceInteraction )
58  {
59  if( fSurfaceInteraction != aSurfaceInteraction )
60  {
61  intmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> tried to remove surface interaction <" << aSurfaceInteraction->GetName() << "> with surface interaction <" << fSurfaceInteraction->GetName() << "> already set" << eom;
62  return;
63  }
64  intmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> clearing surface interaction <" << aSurfaceInteraction->GetName() << ">" << eom );
65  fSurfaceInteraction = NULL;
66  return;
67  }
68 
69  void KSRootSurfaceInteraction::SetStep( KSStep* aStep )
70  {
71  fStep = aStep;
72  fTerminatorParticle = &(aStep->InitialParticle());
73  fInteractionParticle = &(aStep->InteractionParticle());
74  fParticleQueue = &(aStep->ParticleQueue());
75  return;
76  }
77 
78  void KSRootSurfaceInteraction::ExecuteInteraction()
79  {
80  if( fSurfaceInteraction == NULL )
81  {
82  *fInteractionParticle = *fTerminatorParticle;
83  fStep->SurfaceNavigationFlag() = false;
84  fStep->SurfaceInteractionName().clear();
85 
86  fStep->ContinuousTime() = 0.;
87  fStep->ContinuousLength() = 0.;
88  fStep->ContinuousEnergyChange() = 0.;
89  fStep->ContinuousMomentumChange() = 0.;
90  fStep->DiscreteSecondaries() = 0;
91  fStep->DiscreteEnergyChange() = 0.;
92  fStep->DiscreteMomentumChange() = 0.;
93 
94  intmsg_debug( "surface interaction:" << eom );
95  intmsg_debug( " no surface interactions active" << eom );
96  intmsg_debug( " step continuous time: <" << fStep->ContinuousTime() << ">" << eom );
97  intmsg_debug( " step continuous length: <" << fStep->ContinuousLength() << ">" << eom );
98  intmsg_debug( " step continuous energy change: <" << fStep->ContinuousEnergyChange() << ">" << eom );
99  intmsg_debug( " step continuous momentum change: <" << fStep->ContinuousMomentumChange() << ">" << eom );
100  intmsg_debug( " step discrete secondaries: <" << fStep->DiscreteSecondaries() << ">" << eom );
101  intmsg_debug( " step discrete energy change: <" << fStep->DiscreteEnergyChange() << ">" << eom );
102  intmsg_debug( " step discrete momentum change: <" << fStep->DiscreteMomentumChange() << ">" << eom );
103 
104  intmsg_debug( "surface interaction interaction particle state: " << eom );
105  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle space: <" << (fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSpace() ? fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSpace()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom );
106  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle surface: <" << (fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSurface() ? fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSurface()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom );
107  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle time: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetTime() << ">" << eom );
108  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle length: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetLength() << ">" << eom );
109  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle position: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetPosition().X() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetPosition().Y() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom );
110  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle momentum: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum().X() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom );
111  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle kinetic energy: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ">" << eom );
112  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle electric field: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetElectricField().X() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetElectricField().Y() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetElectricField().Z() << ">" << eom );
113  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle magnetic field: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetMagneticField().X() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetMagneticField().Y() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetMagneticField().Z() << ">" << eom );
114  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle angle to magnetic field: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetPolarAngleToB() << ">" << eom );
115 
116  return;
117  }
118 
119  ExecuteInteraction( *fTerminatorParticle, *fInteractionParticle, *fParticleQueue );
120  fStep->SurfaceNavigationFlag() = true;
121  fInteractionParticle->ReleaseLabel( fStep->SurfaceInteractionName() );
122 
123  fStep->ContinuousTime() = 0.;
124  fStep->ContinuousLength() = 0.;
125  fStep->ContinuousEnergyChange() = 0.;
126  fStep->ContinuousMomentumChange() = 0.;
127  fStep->DiscreteSecondaries() = fParticleQueue->size();
128  fStep->DiscreteEnergyChange() = fInteractionParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() - fTerminatorParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV();
129  fStep->DiscreteMomentumChange() = (fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum() - fTerminatorParticle->GetMomentum()).Magnitude();
130 
131  intmsg_debug( "surface interaction:" << eom );
132  intmsg_debug( " surface interaction name: <" << fStep->GetSurfaceInteractionName() << ">" << eom );
133  intmsg_debug( " step continuous time: <" << fStep->ContinuousTime() << ">" << eom );
134  intmsg_debug( " step continuous length: <" << fStep->ContinuousLength() << ">" << eom );
135  intmsg_debug( " step continuous energy change: <" << fStep->ContinuousEnergyChange() << ">" << eom );
136  intmsg_debug( " step continuous momentum change: <" << fStep->ContinuousMomentumChange() << ">" << eom );
137  intmsg_debug( " step discrete secondaries: <" << fStep->DiscreteSecondaries() << ">" << eom );
138  intmsg_debug( " step discrete energy change: <" << fStep->DiscreteEnergyChange() << ">" << eom );
139  intmsg_debug( " step discrete momentum change: <" << fStep->DiscreteMomentumChange() << ">" << eom );
140 
141  intmsg_debug( "surface interaction reflection interaction particle state: " << eom );
142  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle space: <" << (fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSpace() ? fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSpace()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom );
143  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle surface: <" << (fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSurface() ? fInteractionParticle->GetCurrentSurface()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom );
144  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle time: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetTime() << ">" << eom );
145  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle length: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetLength() << ">" << eom );
146  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle position: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetPosition().X() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetPosition().Y() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom );
147  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle momentum: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum().X() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom );
148  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle kinetic energy: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ">" << eom );
149  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle electric field: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetElectricField().X() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetElectricField().Y() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetElectricField().Z() << ">" << eom );
150  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle magnetic field: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetMagneticField().X() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetMagneticField().Y() << "," << fInteractionParticle->GetMagneticField().Z() << ">" << eom );
151  intmsg_debug( " interaction particle angle to magnetic field: <" << fInteractionParticle->GetPolarAngleToB() << ">" << eom );
152 
153  return;
154  }
155 
156  STATICINT sKSRootSurfaceInteractionDict =
157  KSDictionary< KSRootSurfaceInteraction >::AddCommand( &KSRootSurfaceInteraction::SetSurfaceInteraction, &KSRootSurfaceInteraction::ClearSurfaceInteraction, "set_surface_interaction", "clear_surface_interaction" );
